high_descs: Turn to the right and face the bed.
Pick the book up that is closest to the edge of the bed.
Go to the right to face the night stand with the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a book and turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and move to stand in front of the white cell phone on the bed.
Pick up the blue book closest to your and the phone from the bed.
Turn right and carry the book to the nightstand with the lamp on top to the right of the bed.
Turn on the lamp to take a look at the book in the light.
anns.task_desc: Examine the book by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn to your right and go to the end of the bed in front of you.
Pick up the book that is on the left corner of the bed.
Turn to your right and go to the right end of the night stand, across the room.
Turn on the lamp in the front, right corner of the night stand.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the night stand.
